question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Spoon-billed sandpiper?
1) Its scientific name is Eurynorhyncus pygmeus.
2) The most distinctive feature of this species is its spatulate bill.
3) The IUCN status of Spoon-billed sandpiper is Critically Endangered.
Select the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation: The scientific name of Spoon-billed sandpiper is Eurynorhyncus pygmeus. The IUCN status of the Spoon-billed sandpiper is Critically endangered. The most distinctive feature of this species is its spatulate bill.
